Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Southbound Reroute near 130th/Ellis
ShortDescription: Southbound 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 131st, Ingleside, 132nd and Ellis due to, police activity near 130th/Ellis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Southbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via 131st, Ingleside, 132nd and Ellis due to, police activity near 130th/Ellis.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed near UIC-Halsted
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing near UIC-Halsted due to an obstruction. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing near UIC-Halsted due to an obstruction.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
